'''Fight Fire With Fire''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Kairagi: Fiery Might]] while their weapon is infused with Pyro.

==Trivia==
* Fight Fire With Fire is a reference to a {{w|Metallica}} song of the same name.
** [[Ride the Lightning]], the [[Kairagi: Dancing Thunder]] version of this achievement, is another Metallica song and is the name of the {{w|Ride the Lightning|studio album}} in which both tracks appear.
